website_summaries.verdict: The best ball rebounder that offers a larger surface area than most other outdoor options.
pros: Segmented design offers plenty of surface area for different return angles to maximize practice
Specifically designed for racket sports such as lacrosse
Can be used for other ball sports like baseball, as well
cons: Requires unobstructed height to fit correctly in the backyard

customer_reviews.title: Functionally awesome, but question longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I love the functionality, my oldest boys both use it for baseball and lacrosse practice. However, the color faded really quickly after putting it up in the backyard... I mean within a couple weeks the red around the netting was pink. That leads me to think that it may not stand up well in the Florida sun over a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: B - Legit

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool and product, and the amount of use made of it by my kids bears this out. And when they say it comes with a lifetime warranty, they mean it. My kids used it to the point that some of the elastic bungees snapped. When I contacted Rukket to request new bungees, they went above and beyond and sent us a brand-new unit in its entirety, not merely replacement parts. Exceptionally good purchasing and customer service experience. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Born

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: We've had it now for 5+ months (I wanted to wait to review it once we've used it for a while) and it remains rock-solid! Super well made. The neighbors have all deemed this the best rebounder in the neighborhood, by a long shot! With three boys, I can't help but think how much money I have wasted previously with those cheep rebounders that all fell apart within a few weeks. This is the one to get...no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: It is said “they don’t build them like they used to” well I’ll tell you, I had a pitchback as a kid and this one is built way better than it was. I was not expecting such a well build item, well done guys! The only thing that causes me concern is the net is secured with elastic straps and bungee cords, which overtime will lose their integrity, but I don’t really have any better suggestions for improvements either. I bought this for my grandson, hopefully he will get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional sports trainer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 11-year-old lacrosse player. He absolutely loves it! He is able to practice his shots and catches with the rebounder. As an added bonus the rebounder helps my 10-year-old twin softball players practice their pitching and fielding. It's super sturdy yet easy to move or adjust angles. My kids have spent multiple hours every day outside using this item. Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-multiples

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson uses this for baseball training. I am no longer young enough to keep up with him. He has gone through 4 other cheaper pitch back frames in 4 years. Broke down and bought this. It cost 2X as much but is larger and a lot stronger than other brands. Grandson likes it so PaPa does too. Only downside is this pitch back is harder to put together. Takes 2 people to put together easier.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We searched around and found this to be the best product for the price. The rebounder is great for both our children's sports. We got it specifically for our son who plays lacrosse but our other son likes it and uses it for baseball. It came in a timely manner, but the box was damaged, a softball size hole, but had tape over it and didn't really think much about it. Unfortunately, the bungees that help keep the net tight were missing. I call Rukket and the they sent out the replacement bungees immediately. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Todd G. English

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing, fitment and alignment. Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Lazy assembly instructions. Four possible combinations on a bottom crossbar and they don’t even bother to note which is appropriate. Frustrating rework. But I’m sure saved the author 10 minutes of work. Fitment and alignment is poor. Cheap shoddy manufacturing. Missing a carriage bolt. So frustrating. This thing is so bulky and heavy and poorly packaged that return is impractical and they must know it. Way too expensive for this poor quality and lazy shoddy manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Phillippe

customer_reviews.title: This rebounder works for Volleyball, Lacrosse and Baseball.
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder works for the sports my kid's play. It works for volleyball, lacrosse and baseball. I'm also going to attempt to upload a quick volleyball video. I store it flat and hung up in my garage, but I have to unbolt the back legs to do so. We don't put the back legs bolts back in when we set it up to practice/play. An improvement would be a quick disconnect (button type) to release the back legs when storing it. Happy to have received this during the Stay at Home order.
customer_reviews.author: Itty Bitty City

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, high quality Lacrosse Rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: This is an item we have been thinking about buying for our son for a while and so glad we finally did. Especially during this time of social distancing, it is so great that he can now just go into the back yard and practice his stick skills. It is large and sturdy-lots of rebounding surface! Between myself and my 12 year old son, we were able to pretty easily assemble this beast. It was well packaged, arrived quickly, and comes with a life time guarantee from Rukket Sports. You can't beat that! If a lacrosse rebounder is what you are after, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: Using for Baseball, here's what you need to know.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the rebounder last month, installed about 1/2 of the bungees and was a little disappointed with the performance. It wasn't bad, just weak return. Today I installed about 12 more bungees and what a difference! When using this for baseball, you'll want to install most, if not all, of the bungees. For my purposes (an 11 y/o son), I installed twice as many bungees on the top half and 3 additional on the bottom (cross) bar. I may install the remaining bungees on the bottom section, but it's really not necessary, my son uses the bottom section for grounder drills. Beyond that, this seems to be really excellent quality, compared to two other cheap rebounders we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard throwers!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Can’t say how many hours I’ve used this both indoors and out. The flexibility of being able to adjust not only the angle but the amount of tightness on the webbing makes this perfect for those days when you go from throwing hard to needing some airtime. The frame and netting has withstood summer nights with a few sprinklers. Not recommended but good to know it cleans up quick and can be brought in in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Crazee

customer_reviews.title: Great Net with Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older, smaller Rebounder that had worn out .... when I first tried it, the rebound was pretty minimal, so "fielding" options were severely limited. That evening there was an email from the seller wanting to make sure I was satisfied with the product. When I explained the lack of rebound velocity, he shipped a whole new set of bungees the next day..... now it's working great. Great Customer Support means everything.
customer_reviews.author: Carchop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones learning new sports!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to put together thanks to the video -- though the guy in the video makes it look much easier to attach the net than it actually is! Make sure you have another adult help attach the second side of the net. My 7 year old has been loving the bounce back on his lacrosse ball so far, and we will be using it to practice throwing and catching baseballs too. Would recommend this product for anyone looking for a solid, decent price rebounder.
customer_reviews.author: KAS1217

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rebounder. Very happy and anticipate years of use.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy. It came disassembled and it took me about 45 minutes to build it. The instructions were clear and it wasn't too hard to complete. The hardest part was stretching the bungees as that took some strength. Once I had it complete, it was easy to lift and move to the right part of the yard and we're loving it. Use it for lacrosse pass/catch practice and it's perfect for that. It also angles nicely for groundballs too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: After a year of use...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for a wall since we don't have access to one easily. This rebounder just doesn't have enough bounce. You have to throw quite hard at it, and then run in because the ball will fall short. Lacrosse use exclusively. Maybe other sports work better. I may try to fix it with springs or the like. The bungees are too lossy, as well as the net. Too much energy lost, thus weak rebound.
customer_reviews.author: Strom

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find a replacement net
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product, and I would give it five stars if I could find a replacement net. Unfortunately the roofers just put a hole in ours, and Rukket’s website says they are sold out. If Rukket starts selling replacement nets again, I’d definitely recommend this product. If not, you’ll end up with some useless but sturdy powder coated poles. Update - A few months later, Rukket is still sold out. I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, solid product
customer_reviews.text: It's much larger more solid than I had expected. (A previous rebounder collapsed.) When delivered, the box was quite heavy -- which gives a sense the weight and thickness of the bars. My thirteen-year-old daughter put it together by herself in about an hour (while chatting on the phone when the friends). The photo shows how big it is. We have it in the basement until the weather gets nice outside.
customer_reviews.author: very interesting

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance & net disintegrates !
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to get this for our son. Yet, unfortunately he felt the way in which it performed was not very good. A couple months later the net actually started to disintegrate (see video). Long story short, I waited too long to address this with Rukket to be “eligible “ for a refund (bought in June and tried to get refund in Dec.2...net disintegration started being noted in early Sept/late August). Although, they did offer to send a new net, which we already have quality concerns about due to our experience. We usually never write reviews, but thought we should give others a “heads up”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality. But doesn't fold when installed.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality. -1 Star for 2 reasons. Instructions could have been a little more clearer on how to install the legs. Took me a few tries to get the rubber feet in right position. 2nd reason is that when installed there is no way for me to collapse it for storage. It would have been nice if when position adjuster rings are pulled out for it to be able to fold for storage. Otherwise its a great product I like the idea that they send additional rubber bands so you can adjust the return of net.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: I have owned a few throw backs before this one and the ruckket is better built. I am a handy person I put ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rukket basbeball rebounder is a very well made product. I have owned a few throw backs before this one and the ruckket is better built. I am a handy person I put this together in about 35 minutes. Watch the instructional video on their website it makes putting together unit so easy. My boys 9 and 12 have not stopped playing with it. I have also tried it out and it can withstand my hardest throw and not move.
customer_reviews.author: michael cronin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, No Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The quality is much better than the Primed one we had previously (which was junk). This one is well made and was relatively easy to assemble. The little wrench they include with the hardware was useless; make sure you have a real wrench or socket with you when you begin. Once assembled, it worked well and my son was happy. I would have given it 5 stars but for the instructions, or lack thereof. There were no assembly instructions included. There was a card that said to download the app for instructions. To me it is unacceptable that I have to download an app and provide my email address to get the instructions for a product that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: Provides many hours of skills work for multiple sports
customer_reviews.text: Lacrosse season was cancelled and we got one of these because we suspected the shutdown was going to be more than a few weeks. My child has been practicing lacrosse, softball, and soccer on this and it's earned its spot in the yard. It's requires an adult to move, but both my wife and I find it manageable. No complaints after four solid months of almost daily use by my child. It's a wonderful asset if you have an athletic child that wants to practice their multi-sport passing and catching skills.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It works just great.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get it, it came fast considering it came to Hawaii. I was able to play with my "Pickle back and Paddle", it is great for my eye and and hand coordination. I just got it today so I will see how it holds up, but it seems very sturdy. I wish they made a cover for it, since I have to keep it out in the elements....
customer_reviews.author: V.V.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around product
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this product appears to be very strong and durable. The company also offers a fantastic warranty and service after the fact. That said, there were some issues getting the rebounding netting affixed to the frame - namely that it is a little wrinkled here and there. It won't have a negative impact on the rebounding aspect but from a cosmetic standpoint, it does look a little off. The important part is that my son and daughter enjoy the heck out of the product. A great all around buy.
customer_reviews.author: The Focus Elf

customer_reviews.title: Lax to the max rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has just begun to play lacrosse. This seems to be a well designed, sturdy rebounder. She plays literally for hours at a time. The rebounders does exactly what it supposed to do, solidly bounce the ball back. We keep the rebounder permanently setup in the backyard - it seems quite durable and handles any weather condition.
customer_reviews.author: Research Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Lost its bounce....Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: A useful product, but after about a year of occasional use, the bounce back isn’t bouncing back The springs no longer have a spring so now useless. I've contacted Rukket and they responded that they would look into it, but it has been a couple of weeks and I have not received any additional information. As a result, I would not recommend this product if you want it to last more than a year of occasional use. BTW, the rebounder was undercover and we are in California so mild weather.
customer_reviews.author: bismarckotto

customer_reviews.title: The best bounce back on the market right now.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bounce back. I have 2 and use them a lot. We use it for lacrosse and the ball comes back strong and you can adjust the angles. The only issue i've had is over time the attachment hooks stretch out and need to be readjusted or replaced. The anchors supplied work well if the ground is firm but you might have to get additional anchors if your ground is soft.
customer_reviews.author: svknight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for LAX Practice
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is great for practicing LAX by yourself or with a friend. It is sturdy and pretty portable. It is easy to move though it does take two people (or one very tall person) to move it. The directions are 'ok' for putting it together (we did have to take a couple pieces apart and redo) but once it is together it is great.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherG

customer_reviews.title: Rukkert Rocks
customer_reviews.text: With all the pitch backs on the market it's hard to choose sometimes. But after purchasing this one the choice is clear Rukkert. My son and daughter play base ball and LAX. This product serves them both well. Well constructed easy to put together and it looks cool too. It gets used every day for baseball or lacrosse. Thanks for such a quality product
customer_reviews.author: john leone

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and they will stand behind it but the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and they will stand behind it but the rebound is very poor for using a baseball. I have to stand about 10 feet away and comes back very slow. I have used all of the bungy cords but still poor..
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder. Not portable.
customer_reviews.text: Great rebounder. Perfect for my son. Since receiving this, I have seen massive improvements in his play. If you're looking for something portable, this is not what you want. I wasn't, so this great for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This Works Well At First But Don't Leave It Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: The Rukket 4x7 is impressive when you set it up, and my kid loves it. That said, he's only six, so he doesn't use it that much. Just want to let people know not to leave it outside, despite that the product description says "built for long-term outdoor use." In just over a year of outdoor use, the trim on the rebounder has deteriorated and basically turned to powder, and the bungees started to snap on their own. When I went on the Rukket website, the replacement nets were sold out. I would rather not buy a whole new unit and add to the landfill... I have e-mailed the company and will provide an update if I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: TedSF

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product worth.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must have for improving hand eye coordination for youngsters. Part of the old Bobby Knight IU training regimen. Children will improve more than 100% and this item is sturdily built and will free stand on its own without tie down unless of course Nolan Ryan is throwing at it and even then will stand the stress on the net.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN W GRAY

customer_reviews.title: Great practice aid!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teenage son. It’s a great rebounder. Very sturdy. My son uses it daily. Only issue is it’s size. It’s huge. And it doesn’t collapse down at all, not even the legs. We have to turn it on it’s side to store in the garage. And it takes up a ton of space.
customer_reviews.author: SkyR8der

customer_reviews.title: The kids seem to like it and it is useful in helping them with ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use it much, just getting started with it. The kids seem to like it and it is useful in helping them with proper catching technique. The directions were not clear at all, however, if you ignored them and followed the markings on the pieces, it went together fairly easily. It is one of the more expensive rebounders, however, it is also quite a bit larger, and the net seems to be quite strong for now. We'll have to wait for summer to end to know more!
customer_reviews.author: John's family

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all great customer service and second, the product is built to last! You are not going to get this kind of quality at your local stores. I got this for my daughter for lacrosse but we use it for soccer too. My 18 year old son and 10 year old daughter both love it. You can rip shots at it and it comes right back. I wasn’t sure it would handle a soccer ball but it does with ease! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O.

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart After 8 months
customer_reviews.text: -Bought before Xmas 2018 used 5-7x per month. -Assembled per online intructions -shaded but outdoor storage North Texas (super hot, humid, with spring hail/rain) Liked: (in descending order): Price, Assembly, Convenience Disliked: Bought this before Christmas and the center netting is getting soft. The edge netting is ALREADY falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got done setting this Bad Boy up! I opened the box & WOW!!! The tubular frame is bigger & beefier than expected, the netting well made& nice & tight! They have initial straps & hooks on the net then they give you a huge bag of bungee hooks to make it even better, with plenty to spare! The kids were stoked as well as myself! Well worth it, Superb product! Amazon always chooses high quality products like Rukket!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sagnella

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use abc outside the net is already ripping . Now my return window is closed so upsetting after paying all this money
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: High quality product that was simple to put together. My kids have been throwing a baseball at it all week. It is sturdy enough to throw a basketball against, which my younger son has also been doing. It only has been up for a week, but it looks like it will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one, vs. the more common bounce back, and my kids love it! We bought it for lacrosse, but of course they've thrown basketballs, footballs and soccer balls into it. My 11 year old mostly set it up on his own, with some help from me, putting on the last few elastic ties that make the net nice and tight. It is big, but a good size for what my kids want to do with it. It seems to be very good quality, and hopefully will live outside in our backyard for many years! (We've only had it 2 weeks, so I can't fully comment on the longevity)
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great quarantine toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great quarantine toy! I set this up in my basement for my son. It’s a lifesaver for a 13 year old who has been locked in the house for more than a month due to coronavirus governor’s lockdown! I’m not losing my mind because he’s happy, busy and not begging to brake government rules! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dale (female)

customer_reviews.title: Have a helping hand when setting this up. But great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to practice my lacrosse skills and I love it! I attempted the set up by myself and I would not recommend that haha. Make sure to have a helping hand. Besides the long assembly and how it was kind of difficult to get the cords tight, its great! Definitely recommend! Great rebounder! And it is not that heavy so I move and drag it around my backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Caceres

customer_reviews.title: it is exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and sturdy, stays in place, seems like nice quality net and strong but light frame. Have not used much. but so far so good. I use it in my driveway simple for exercise. I am 44 and never played. I tried with nephew and really enjoyed. do not enjoy simply exercising, so this makes it fun, and is sharping skills I have not don e in 20 years, brings back memories of all sports. been a week. i'm ready to go pro! lol...its fun alone..or it is real fun to make up games and play against people.
customer_reviews.author: Teddyb

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good directions. Wish the net was tighter so the ball would come back with more force. Might have to purchase additional bungies and make it happen. Otherwise, would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is solid!
customer_reviews.text: We put the item together last week and have been using it for Lacrosse and volleyball. This thing doesn't budge. It is very well made and solid. It was actually pretty easy to put together, too.
customer_reviews.author: SGTBaXa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, longtime lax player
customer_reviews.text: As a former lacrosse coach and mom of 3 players, this is exactly what I was looking for. It has amazing strength and bounce back ability. It is very taut and the netting is perfect. Very pleased with my purchase and couldn't ask for anything better. We've used for days now and are not disappointed. If you are choosing among other options, this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: NE Suburban Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is great for price and features. We live in a townhouse with no yard. We pull it out everyday stick the base on and ready to go. My 13 yo daughter carries it out and puts together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric’s Muscle Cars

customer_reviews.title: great tool to help prepare a young lacrosse player
customer_reviews.text: loved the product, but the adjustable legs are not functioning properly. The button that is supposed to pop out does not always come out. The pole is installed correctly and there is room for the button to pop out but it seems the spring is not strong enough. If you don't care about the adjustment of the back legs its an awesome pitch-back.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K Farriss

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & solid product
customer_reviews.text: In these times of Covid-19, I was looking for something the kids could use in the backyard to practice sports since all the leagues and practices were cancelled. The Rukket rebounder did not disappoint. After assembly, it is very sturdy, and has a very generous sized surface for throwing into. The only tricky part was adding the tensioners around the perimeter to make the surface nice and tight for throwing. The adjusting angle feature is an added bonus and is easy to use with the hinged surface. All around great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, provides immediate feed back to the person practicing, and is adjustible for various return angles. This is the best return net I have seen or used, don't leave it outside, but it is large and not the easiest thing to move in and out of a man door, and it does not fold up, the support can be taken apart if you use wing nuts to attache it. Overall it is a very good training tool.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: This is the best rebounder!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several rebounders over the years and this one is the best! It was easy to assemble, it is easy to move around and the bounce is phenomenal! We have this set up in our garage and the boys have to rebound daily when there is no lax practice or game. They have a daily routine and this thing takes it. The bounce is quiet and it doesn't move because of the rubber feet. I highly recommend this rebounder for anyone whose kiddo wants to get better at throwing and catching lax balls.
customer_reviews.author: da dumais

customer_reviews.title: She has been using it for practice and it works great. It is easy to move around and store
customer_reviews.text: after researching the different rebounders, we chose the Rukket because of the many positive reviews. My daughter plays lacrosse and we wanted a net she could use to practice. While we try to avoid items we have to put together, this was not difficult. My 13 year old daughter put it together, it took her about a half hour, and she has minimal experience. So, someone who is handy should not have any problem. She likes the adjustable angles and its portability. She has been using it for practice and it works great. It is easy to move around and store. All in all, good product, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Newbold

customer_reviews.title: Defective but still great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best defective pitch back I ever used. My friend has one so I decided to get one as well. The pads on the rear bottom leg are installed on the wrong side. You can put them inside or outside because of the way the holes line up. I'm very disappointed about this. I went to my friends house and theirs is the exact same way. She just didn't feel like dealing with the online crap so is leaving it be.
customer_reviews.author: nickolas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dryland Water Polo Training
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter decided to pick up water polo as a sport. While she's a competitive swimmer, she's not spent a lot of time with ball sports and her throwing motion and capability isn't very strong. We picked this out to help with her dryland training for throwing, and it's fantastic! Sturdy and strong; the extra bungees make it even better for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble but does not work like other less ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not return anything but ground balls. Net is too tight and doesn’t allow for pop up balls. It was easy to assemble but does not work like other less expensive rebounders do.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, really great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by the quality. Very heavy duty. My daughter uses it for lacrosse. It works perfectly. It even comes with extra tension bands in case you want it make it stiffer (which would allow you to throw from father away).
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: The best there is
customer_reviews.text: Great Rebounder This is the BEST rebounder I have ever used. Hitting the net almost anywhere will rebound the ball back to you, not off to the side. It is heavy and it is big, these are what make it so great. I have not needed ground stakes and it does not move. Another plus, the customer service is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: M_

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old boy has really given this thing a workout. He loves it. Good return line drives. Only had it a couple months and it’s already turned pink.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for one who enjoys playing lacrosse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old grandson's birthday. He loves it ! Great gift for a young man who enjoys playing lacrosse. A word of advice, use real tools to assemble. The enclosed wrench is totally inadequate .
customer_reviews.author: FabFeet

customer_reviews.title: Great for lacrosse and baseball
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great for lacrosse and baseball. My sons use it all the time. It stays outside and has not started to rust. The only thing is when you scoot it to move it around you need to be careful that the gripper pads on the rail don’t pull off the bottom. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N Walters

customer_reviews.title: Easiest assembly I've ever done
customer_reviews.text: Every part fit perfect. Loved how all the bots were same size and then was given 2 plastic washers, thus eliminating the chance of putting two smaller bolts, had they been provided, in the wrong spot. All the extra bungee straps will come in useful after my daughter starts abusing this pitch back. Would recommend tightening with 16mm socket. The people who are knocking this assembly probably have soft hands and have never built anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Feels very sturdy, haven't even had to stake it on the ground (stakes came with it) My just turned 7yr old son loves it - he can get ground balls, fly balls, and line drives on this. Assembly was straightforward and not difficult. Plenty of extra bungee if you want to tighten the net even more, but the amount specifies in the instructions are doing the trick so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Edelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pitch back
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good quality pitch back this one is for you. The poles are very durable and look like they will last for a long time. We have only had this for a month but we are completely satisfied with our purchase. I have had experience with other brands of pitch backs where this was not the case. They supply you with more than enough bands to support the net so you shouldn't have to purchase anything additional. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 kids playing club level ball. This product is used daily by at least one of them. We have gone the cheap route in the past and that didnt last more than a few weeks. Then we have tried the mid priced rebounders that lasted better but eventually fell to the relentless abuse. The Rukket is built like a tank and works perfectly. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Loren S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our 11 and 9 year old boys to practice lacrosse drills. They like it a lot. They said they use it together standing in a V so it rebounds to the other. Rather large than the standard rebounder. Set up took some time but my husband said it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: BEM

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought the 4x7 Rukket pitchback. My boys have worn out a couple competitor's products, and I was very impressed at the quality of the Rukket pitchback. It was easy to set up, and I like that they add extra bungee cords (in case you want to add more to increase the rebound strength). This pitchback is strong & heavy enough to set in a driveway/gym, but it also comes with stakes (for grass). My boys (13 & 11) love it and say that it is the best one they have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Great for Little league practice
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for my son's 8th Birthday gift. He now spends most of his time outdoors practicing/playing with his Rukket training screen. The drills you could do on it are endless. He has shown great improved while playing second base in his little league games. We all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this piece of equipment is awesome-I put it together in about one leisurely hour today. The hardest part was the bungee cords at the end-but my son helped with the last few tough ones at the bottom. Got it outside and he was instantly able to practice his lacrosse and baseball. Excellent product! Will try to update my review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineP

customer_reviews.title: should have gotten a better quality
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more and gotten a better quality. it is not as strong as it should. the ball doesnt bounce back as it does with other rebounder.
customer_reviews.author: Roc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We just received the Rukket Rebounder I ordered for my 11 year old son to practice lacrosse. He was actually able to set up the majority of it himself, until the end with the net and bungies. The parts are all very sturdy, the netting is thick and strong and the directions were very easy to follow. although it is brand new, he's already enjoyed hours with it this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ladies1st

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a lot of chance to use this yet (bad weather) but it is a very well put together product. Very solid. I do not expect any issues with it. It also included a number of extra bungees that I thought was nice. As bungees wear out over time you can replace. I would recommend to anyone needed a pitch back.
customer_reviews.author: muddman33

customer_reviews.title: Just Bought a 2nd one for Ex-wifes house!  Better than High Lacrosse Bouncebacks
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of High Bouncebacks, and they work fine, but if your kids miss low, you are chasing the ball. This one works great and goes all the way to the ground. I have 2 boys playing now. 1 Defense and 1 Attack. They can both use it, and the Attack takes low shots on this like a goal, and it works great. I wish I had this for my older boy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Uzzolino

customer_reviews.title: It does it all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two boys to practice until their arm falls off. Quality of materials is first rate, easy to setup and adjust. Bought mainly for baseball but within minutes after setting up they boys threw all type of balls at it. They are using it for baseball, as a rebounder and passing assistant in basketball, football, lacrosse etc. They love it and I am sure they will find more uses for it as time goes by. Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brand

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: We like this product. Very sturdy and solid quality. All materials have a high-end feel - sturdy steel poles, galvanized nuts/bolts/washers, well-braided net. My wife and I assembled it in 30 minutes. Installation tip - look up assembly videos online (search youtube for "Rukket baseball net"). It really helps visualize it. We had it for a week so far, and it works very well. My general feeling is it will last a long time and not require much care.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Very well built, not the "bounce" I'd thought though.
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality, built very well. Was easy enough to assemble. However, as some others have mentioned here, the rebound action is not as lively/powerful as I'd expected. I've assembled exactly as instructed, it's nothing to to with how it was assembled -- just doesn't have quite the "bounce" I thought it would have. It will last though.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice
customer_reviews.text: Good for practice. Must throw medium to hard to get any sensible rebound action. Construction is excellent. Just needs more tension either in the webbing and or bungy chord attachments to give it more springyness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bohurjak

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble of very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Much bigger than expected, but perfect for kids and adults to practice ball skills. My Grandson is water polo player and can practice his trows, plays Lacrosse, great for practice, Grandma uses it for strength and coordination practice, throwing a 3lb ball. Comes back and requires you to retrieve it and throw again. Nice product. Fairly easy to assemble of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Putting it together was straight forward
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Putting it together was straight forward, and the directions were simple and easy. After getting it put together I took it out threw baseball and softball. It works great. I would recommend this to anyone no matter age.
customer_reviews.author: James Rizer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Having had many baseball bets that fell apart after a few weeks of play, we ordered the lacrosse hoping it would be a tougher made version. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KStrong

customer_reviews.title: Great throw back net
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday hit with our guy. He loves it. Made well, really large compared to what he has had in the past which is a plus. Overall, it was a great purchase. Arrived exactly as promised, and is as described. Will definitely recommend to everyone looking for a net.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Alley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product - love it! Used a YouTube video to help with assembly. Very simple and works great. Can already see progress made by my 6 six year old in a very short time. Is bigger than I expected, takes up more space in the garage then I was prepared for. Be sure to assemble outdoors, was difficult to get outside once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product! I was looking to purchase a quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I was looking to purchase a quality re-bounder for my sons birthday, we have had several cheap versions of this in the past and I wanted a product that would last. This re-bounder is quite heavy, so it does not fall over, blow over, etc. Since April it has seen a ton of use not only from my son but also from my daughters kicking the soccer ball at it. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for a great quality product that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Nagy

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of doing to assemble, but it's a nice product. We've had it a couple months and gotten a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: WMsmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You do need some strong hands to assemble it though. Including a tool to pull the bungies during assembly might be a good idea. I used a metal hook thingy which made it easier. Bounce back works great for my lacrosse playing girls. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DLEE

customer_reviews.title: Once again very satisfied with a Rukket product
customer_reviews.text: Once again very satisfied with a Rukket product. Very well made and easy to assemble. We have gone through a few rebound nets for my daughter and have never been satisfied. This one has met all of our needs and looks to be a product that will last through years of use. This not a small product and will not be easily portable. It does fit into the back of my truck to be moved to the ball fields for team practice. A great addition as a practice tool for improving your game.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel V.

customer_reviews.title: Large surface area no dead spots
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a while for a solid bounce back for my lax and baseball playing 13, 10 &6 year old. It has been a fantastic purchase so far. Solid, well made put together in 15min. You’ll need 2 people for assistance with the small bungee cords but other than that easy. I was missing one nut, contacted support they sent out a new one ASAP. Only time will tell in how it holds up but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Darren Tow

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is very sturdy and works perfectly. It is very easy to assemble and only requires one person to put together. The materials used are very sturdy and seem like they will have longevity. It is not light but it is not difficult for one person to move around at all. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Brady F.

customer_reviews.title: Works good for a year.
customer_reviews.text: The net lasted about a year and a half in the CA sun. The rebounder slowly diminishes over time and you can’t get replacement nets.
customer_reviews.author: Kreed

customer_reviews.title: 5 months in, having issues...
customer_reviews.text: A net strap tore after 5 months of individual weekly use (see pictures). I used the extra bungees to tighten the net, but it still does not give enough pitch back tension for serious drill work. When left outside discoloration occurs on the red trim. I can't take this to the park without a truck. I can live with the discoloration, but the net should at least last half a year. I need more pitch back tension. There are a lot of good things to be said about this product, but as of right now the negative is outweighing the positive, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well-designed product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of construction was apparent from the moment I opened the box. The hardware was solid (including metal fasteners, not plastic), everything fit as it was supposed to, and the instructions were clear. Little details like the rubber pads on the base to prevent sliding show that considerable thought went into the design. Assembly was straightforward and the rebounder performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: I.R.F.

customer_reviews.title: Game speed action
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder delivers more speed on the return than the trampoline version. Since it's a net and not a trampoline, it's more resistant to the wind and doesn't blow over as easily. Also more portable. I'm a high school coach with a high school kid and we both pounded this net with a few hundred balls without seeing any degradation in the rebound velocity. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Trietley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing with this since the moment he received it!
customer_reviews.author: RJK9600

customer_reviews.title: Great to improve skill
customer_reviews.text: Really improved my son’s abilities. Even his coach asked him what he was doing differently and it was this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather I.

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Lacrosse net. I was surprised to see how sturdy it was
customer_reviews.author: R. B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, huge, my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material except the rubber feet. They started coming off within 2 uses due to poor design (soft silicone type material can’t be attached with a screw and no washer, duh). Overall a great product. Fairly easy to put together as long as you have a trampoline tool!
customer_reviews.author: BusyFosterMom

customer_reviews.title: so I think it's working great! However
customer_reviews.text: We gave this net to our children for their birthday because they are brand new to Lacross, they got to use it one day and were able to throw the ball and receive it, so I think it's working great ! However, a few days later we got a foot of snow so we haven't had a lot of experience with it, but what we've seen so far ,we do like the product. Its sturdy,looks quality made and definiely functioned like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Solid build and works great! We are using it for lacrosse and baseball and it feels like a great quality piece that will last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: motor city

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Some of my screws didn't fit in the holes but it was still sturdy without them! The bungees require a bit of strength for the actually net but once that's on your all good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Zeljka Palaia

product_meta.title: Rukket 4x7ft Lacrosse Rebounder Pitchback Training Screen | Practice Catching, Throwing, and Shooting
feature_bullets: PERFECT LACROSSE REBOUNDER for all skill levels. Extra bungees for incredible bounce back strength to practice every aspect of the game.
IMPROVE YOUR GAME FAST: With 4 attack angles, the Rukket rebounder training screen will give you the repetition to work on different techniques and take your skills to the next level.
NOT A SINGLE “DEAD” AREA: At 4ft x 7ft our rebounder gives you more than 20 square feet of superior ball return surface, for whatever curve ball might be thrown next.
BUILT FOR LONG-TERM OUTDOOR USE: 1.25 inch powder-coated metal frame, heavy duty carriage bolt fasteners, and mesh protected bungees ensure long-term outdoor use.
RUKKET 100% LIFETIME WARRANTY and SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Includes lifetime replacement parts and outstanding USA-based email and phone customer service for no-risk purchasing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
